climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: MILK SCENT: A clean, sweet, fresh, and pleasing scent

TRADITIONALLY CRAFTED SOAP: 250 gram large soap bars measure 4 x 2.75 x 1.37" and are made using old-world methods in the French Provence to produce a soap that has few impurities and an incredibly smooth texture which creates a longer lasting soap

FEEL THE LUXURY: Pre de Provence luxurious soaps creates a rich, creamy lather to gently moisturize and soften your skin; use as all over body soap or leave by the bathroom sink as hand soap for guests
BEAUTIFUL FRAGRANCE: Made with quality ingredients, our soap bars will fill your bathroom with delicious scents down to the very last sliver of soap

THE PERFECT HOUSEHOLD SOAP: Use in every bathroom, at the kitchen sink, or give it away in a luxury-infused gift basket for bridal, baby shower, or mother's day gifts; also makes a great stocking stuffer
body.description: For centuries, the luxury of French-milled soaps has remained the gold standard of excellence. Each time you begin to lather with French made soap, you enter a time and place where quality and craftsmanship have stood still. Traditional French soap is triple-milled to produce a completely uniform and smooth soap, without impurities, thus lasting longer.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Pré de Provence Specialty Soaps Shea Butter Infused & Quad-Milled For Luxurious, Long Lasting Soap For centuries, the luxury of French-milled soaps has remained the gold standard of excellence. Each time you begin to lather with French made soap, you enter a time and place where quality and craftsmanship have stood still. Traditional French soap is triple-milled to produce a completely uniform and smooth soap, without impurities, thus lasting longer. Each bar of Pré de Provence soap is not only carefully made today by dedicated soap makers in Provence following their proud traditions, but quad-milled to be smoother and have a richer lather to create our luxurious feel. More From Pré de Provence Men's No. 63 Skincare Bath Salts & Bubble Bath Lotions & Body Butter Hand & Foot Creams Argan Oil & Scrubs

About Pré de Provence Created from the finest of natural ingredients, Pré de Provence products are meticulously fashioned in Provence by French artisans following traditions established generations ago. We find our inspiration here, where fields of lavender, wild flowers, herbs, fruits and vegetables, and the fresh sea air abound. Extreme pride and care is the foundation for everything we create, upholding the quality, artistry and authenticity demanded of products 'Made in France'. Nature casts a magical spell on this haven in southern France, nestled between sky-reaching mountains and the Mediterranean Sea. The skies shine blue, endless mineral-rich waters sparkle, and verdant meadows abound with fragrant treasures of lavender, wildflowers, herbs, fruits and vegetables. Just breathing the wonderful scents in the air brings peace and tranquility.

Not all French Soaps are created equal... Quad-Milled Soap Traditional French soap is triple-milled to produce a completely uniform and smooth soap, without impurities, thus lasting longer. Every bar of Pre de Provence soap is not only carefully made today by the dedicated soap makers in Provence following their proud traditions, but quad-milled to be smoother and have a richer lather to create our luxurious feel. Shea Butter Soap Bar Using all pure, natural ingredients enriched with shea butter, you can feel the difference between regular soap and French Soap. Aromatic fragrances transport you to a moment of calmness, vitality, dreaming, or well-being. Bring the meadows of Provence into your world with our ultra rich, wonderfully scented specialty soaps available in a 250g & 150g bar. Discover Our Men's Line No. 63 We are known for our excellent soap but we have a lot more to offer. Discover our No. 63 Men's skincare collection, our shea butter lotions and butters, relaxing bath salts, our citrus and lavender argan oil collection, and our full range of soaps including Italian and guest soaps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This soap is an excellent product.
reviews.reviewText: A great moisturizer and creamy soap. Has a fresh scent that leaves you feeling clean and healthy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This feels so good on the skin
reviews.reviewText: I used to be able to buy this locally at a store that closed. I have a lot of allergies to smells and some soaps and perfumes. This is the only soap I have been able to find that doesn't affect my nasal allergies or skin allergies. It fills like a spa soap. A little pricy but when I look at my Dr recommendations, it is well worth the price. I am a repeat buyer of this soap. I just love it and to me it is not over powering and actually smells good. I use the Moisturizing Soap Bar, Shea Butter Enriched, Quad Milled for Long Lasting Rich Smooth Lather.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Rich and creamy, lathers well.
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE how rich and creamy it feels. I'm sensitive to most fragrances. This one is mild, works well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I used to use the milk soap from L’Occitane but unfortunately they changed their formulation and smell. This one smell just like the old L’Occitane one used to and it’s cheaper. I’ll definitely buy more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bath Soap; Shave Soap — It Does Both!
reviews.reviewText: I bought the 150g bar of the “Milk” scented PdP Bath Soap and my family loved. Smells awesome and washes well.I wrote to Pre de Provence’s American distributor begging them to use the same scent in their shave soap. Naturally, I heard nothing and it was only a few weeks ago, but asking doesn’t necessarily hurt.Flash forward to bath time and this 250g is being used and its creamy, shea goodness is just so rich and slick that I couldn’t help thinking it would make a most excellent shave soap.It does! And it’s very nice. No brush needed.More importantly, it’s a great bath soap that triggers memories of cherished grandparents and I enjoy it more than any body wash or bath soap I’ve ever used before. And my family likes it, too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Dries my skin
reviews.reviewText: I love so much about this soap - the scent is perfect and it lathers well, but it is drying. It leaves my skin squeaky clean if you know what I mean. I am trying to replace my discontinued formula Claus Porto almond oil soap, and have probably tried 25 soaps now, but none are right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Long lasting and smells great
reviews.reviewText: I've been buying the biggest bars for gifts and personal use for about 20 years. They are easy to hold, have wonderful scents and don't dissolve quickly like so many soaps do. Well worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing bar of soap
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this soap for years. I have sensitive skin and this bar is not only huge and smells good, the lather it makes, is so good! It's the best soap out there
Me encanta está marca de jabones.
Ce savon est très doux et son parfum est léger et agréable. Il mousse bien. Bon achat.
